description: Collision involving multiple vehicles with possible injuries on a major corridor.
steps: Verify exact location using GPS and nearest intersection identifier.
Dispatch police and ambulance units to the scene.
Secure the scene by controlling nearby traffic signals and creating a safety buffer.
Notify the nearest hospital if injuries are reported or suspected.
Log incident details into the central incident management system.
description_cleaned: collision involving multiple vehicles with possible injuries on a major corridor
text_processed: collision involving multiple vehicle possible injury major corridor

description: An ambulance, fire truck, or police vehicle is significantly delayed by congestion.
steps: Identify blocked segments on the planned emergency route.
Request signal priority and green wave along an alternate path when feasible.
Notify the emergency dispatch center with updated estimated time of arrival.
Coordinate with police units to clear blocking vehicles in front of the emergency vehicle.
description_cleaned: an ambulance fire truck or police vehicle is significantly delayed by congestion
text_processed: ambulance fire truck police vehicle significantly delayed congestion

description: Presence of smoke or fire near the roadway detected by sensors or cameras.
steps: Confirm smoke or fire levels using camera feeds and sensor data.
Block or partially close the affected segment and reroute all non-emergency traffic.
Dispatch fire department and ambulance to the scene.
Keep emergency lane free using Traffic Light Agent coordination and manual overrides if needed.
description_cleaned: presence of smoke or fire near the roadway detected by sensors or cameras
text_processed: presence smoke fire near roadway detected sensor camera

description: Road segment partially or fully flooded, posing risk to vehicles and pedestrians.
steps: Mark flooded road segments as closed in the knowledge graph and routing engine.
Reroute vehicles away from flooded areas using alternate corridors.
Coordinate with municipal services for drainage and cleanup.
Broadcast alerts to drivers through variable message signs and in-vehicle systems.
description_cleaned: road segment partially or fully flooded posing risk to vehicles and pedestrians
text_processed: road segment partially fully flooded posing risk vehicle pedestrian

description: Two-vehicle collision with no serious injuries but potential lane blockage.
steps: Verify that there are no serious injuries using sensor data or manual confirmation.
Advise drivers to move vehicles to the shoulder if safe.
Adjust nearby traffic signal timings to prevent spillback and long queues.
Dispatch tow truck if any vehicle is not drivable.
description_cleaned: twovehicle collision with no serious injuries but potential lane blockage
text_processed: twovehicle collision serious injury potential lane blockage
